VEC.Q: How many ring layers are in this sunburst chart?
How many segments are in this sunburst chart?

SRP.A: Rental Market is positioned {inside} Multi-Family Homes.

VPR.A: The top-level category with the highest proportion is {Commercial Real Estate}.

NF.Q: Which categories in the segment Commercial Real Estate exceed 100%? Please list the category names and corresponding percentages.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Commercial Real Estate or Office Buildings?
NC.A: The value of {Commercial Real Estate} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Office Buildings, Residential Property, or Rental Market?

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
MSR.A: The path that contributes the most to the total is: {Rental Market to Short-Term Rentals to Vacation Homes}.
